description: Python is a popular programming language. It was created by Guido van Rossum, and released in 1991 and further developed by the Python Software Foundation.Python is an easy to learn, powerful programming language. It has efficient high-level data structures and a simple but effective approach to object-oriented programming. Python’s elegant syntax and dynamic typing, together with its interpreted nature, make it an ideal language for scripting and rapid application development in many areas on most platforms.
